title: Attempts 1,2,3
body: I just installed lol on a laptop , all patched and updates , and when i try to log into my account , the attempts just arrives in a second , Please someone help me , i had this issue in the past with a computer but i dont remember how i solved . Thank you                        {{item:3070}}

replies.body: It seems that your network might be having an issue connecting to the authentication server, but don't worry we can help!  I recommend going over each step in the [connection issues](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) guide to make sure your connection is able to establish communication.  Let me know if you have any questions!
